name: structSetMetadata
description: Sets metadata for a key in a struct. When you want to SerializeJSON, the key and the value will be display as you defined in the metadata.

params.name: inputStruct
params.description: The struct in which you want to add the metadata.

params.name: metaStruct
params.description: The metadata struct you want to add.

examples.title: Add metadata to a struct
examples.description:
Add metadata to a struct and serialze to a json.
It is changing the keyname and convert a string ("20") to a number.
